alert.note: Alert for Ballard (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 17 at 11:16AM EST until January 18 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following river in Kentucky... Illinois... Ohio River at Olmsted Lock and Dam. .River levels have begun to fall with the river forecast to drop below flood stage at Olmsted tonight. For the Ohio River...including Olmsted Lock and Dam...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING THROUGH LATE TONIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Ohio River at Olmsted Lock and Dam. * WHEN...Until tomorrow morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:00 AM CST Monday the stage was 36.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage just after midnight tonight. - Flood stage is 36.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
